comments.body: You will receive a lower amount from the upcoming weekly, monthly or post-monthly bonus if you don't start wagering on your Stake account. You have received the standard bonus amount (base reward) for your VIP level. Perhaps, you will receive around $6 from the next weekly bonus if your wagering activity doesn't change at Stake. Anyway, Primedice has the same VIP loyalty system as Stake. You will get similar treatment from there. But the weekly or monthly bonus is based on the wager at most other casino.
